entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:28 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 4:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
